longBusinessSummary: Black Spade Acquisition Co does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the entertainment industry. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.

companyOfficers.name: Dr. Chi-Wai  Tam (Aust), CMA, CPA, Ph.D.
companyOfficers.title: Exec. Chairman & Co-CEO
